1038097 THE SUGAR DEVELOPMENT FUND (AMENDMENT) ACT, 2002
ACT NO. 30 OF 2002 [ 27th May, 2002.]
An Act further to amend the Sugar Development Fund Act, 1982.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- third Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
226740 1 Short title and commencement.-
1611295 1This Act may be called the Sugar Development Fund (Amendment) Act, 2002.
1413507 2It shall come into force on such date as the Central Government may, by notification in the Official Gazette, appoint.
1885376 2 Amendment of Act 4 of 1982.- In section 4 of the Sugar Development Fund Act, 1982, in sub- section 1,-
1683621 iafter clause (a), the following clauses shall be inserted, namely:- " (aa) for making loans to any sugar factory or any unit thereof for bagasse- based co- generation power projects with a view to improving their viability;
549751 aaafor making loans to any sugar factory or any unit thereof for production of anhydrous alcohol or ethanol from alcohol with a view to improving their viability;";
170584 iiafter clause (bb), the following clause shall be inserted, namely:- " (bbb) for defraying expenditure on internal transport and freight charges to the sugar factories on export shipments of sugar with a view to promoting its export;".
SUBHASH C. JAIN, Secy. to the Govt. of India.
